newsitem.title: USA: UPS says its express volume rises 9.3 percent.
newsitem.headline: UPS says its express volume rises 9.3 percent.

text.p: United Parcel Service said Tuesday its domestic and international express shipping business posted a 9.3 percent increase in daily volume in the third quarter.
UPS, which provides courier services to more than 200 countries and territories, said it handled a daily average of 1.6 million express packages and documents in the three months ended Sept. 30.
Domestic express volume grew by 9.4 percent over the same period in 1995 while international express volume increased 8.4 percent, the privately held package carrier said.
